name: Kill the Dictator
description: This is a casual strategy simulation game. The game's goal is to overthrow the dictator as the rebel force, or to suppress the rebels as the the government army.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Duo Core Intel or Amd Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Intel or Amd Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb video memory Storage: 120 MB available space
